des:
After you install and set up LYNX at your home, 

You will be able to operate your Bandalux blinds using Alexa after you install and set up LYNX at your home, the easier way to control your blinds.
Ask Alexa to open and close the blinds, to leave them in a concrete position and to turn on a scene. Ask Alexa and Lynx will do it.

The orders are very simple:
“Alexa open the dinner room blinds”
“Alexa open Marco’s blind halfway”
“Alexa close the sleeping room blinds”

For all devices connected to the Lynx Smart Plug, you can ask Alexa:
“Alexa turn on the light”
“Alexa turn off the boiler”

Create scenes in the Lynx app, give them the name you want and ask Alexa to activate them when you need it.

Set up Lynx with Alexa is easy:
1. Connect Lynx skill to Alexa using yout Lynx credentials
2. Ask Alexa to recognize all blinds and scenes.

If you want to group multiple devices and use them at the same time, you should create a group in the Alexa app and activate them when you need it using usual voice commands.


LYNX. Bandalux blinds, now smart. 

For more information visit https://lynx.bandalux.com/
